dc_description_s: Polygon representation of the Facility-wide site boundaries described in a negotiated agreement with the Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources (WDNR) Remediation and Redevelopment program.   A "facility" is an entity at a location currently or formerly involved in activities regulated by the WDNR.  The Facility-wide activity type is an umbrella activity of a subset of activities at a facility that are part of the same negotiated agreement. Generally, Facility-wide sites are large sites with continuing operations that have one or more smaller sites with soil and/or groundwater contamination. There may also be some activities at the same location that should not be part of the Facility-wide activity type because they are not covered by the negotiated agreement.For more information visit the Remediation and Redevelopment program website.
